text: Derek Fowlds (2 September 1937 – 17 January 2020) was an English actor. He is best known for playing Bernard Woolley in popular British television comedies Yes Minister and Yes Prime Minister, and Oscar Blaketon in the long-running ITV police drama Heartbeat.Derek Fowlds Biography (1937–) Fowlds died at the hospital in Bath, Somerset on 17 January 2020 at age 82, from heart failure and sepsis caused by pneumonia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in England Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Actors from London Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
title: Derek Fowlds
